# Duisburg: Industrial Culture on the Rhine

Duisburg: Industrial culture on the Rhine is the third theme route of the Industrial Heritage Trail.
References
* Martina Will: Duisburg: Industriekultur am Rhein. (Themenroute 3 der "Route der Industriekultur"). Kommunalverband Ruhrgebiet, Essen. 1999. 96 S. (Brosch√ºre)
